sentences.english: The recipient bladder and donor bladder patch were then anastomosed.
sentences.chinese: 供體膀胱瓣與受體膀胱全層縫合。

sentences.english: In general idea, cumulus cell is the best nuclear donor cell for reprogramming.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，顆粒細胞作爲核供體最易被核重編程。

sentences.english: We isolated human adipose tissue-derived MSC from four healthy donors.
sentences.chinese: 我們從四個健康的供體分離人脂肪間充質幹細胞。

sentences.english: You need a donor and you need an acceptor.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要一個電子供體和電子受體。

sentences.english: Whatever, thiophenines can be adopted to sensitizers as an electron donor.
sentences.chinese: 但同時也證明了噻吩胺可以作爲光敏染料的電子供體。

sentences.english: A shortage of suitable kidneys for transplant is the most common problem.
sentences.chinese: 腎臟供體的短缺是其中最急迫的問題。

sentences.english: The end-to-side neurorrhaphy do not impact palpably the function of donator.
sentences.chinese: 神經端側縫合術對供體神經的功能無明顯影響。

sentences.english: However, other scenarios include donation after cardiac death require a different approach.
sentences.chinese: 對於心臟停跳的供體選擇不同的處理方法。

sentences.english: A computer matches the donated heart to the person who would benefit the most.
sentences.chinese: 計算機被用來給供體心臟和最能受益的人配型。

sentences.english: All outcomes did not vary by expanded donor criteria status.
sentences.chinese: 通過擴大供體標準狀況也沒有改變所有的結果。

sentences.english: The islets were isolated from the pancreas of brain-dead donors.
sentences.chinese: 用於移植的胰島細胞取自腦死亡供體的胰腺。

sentences.english: Pancreas underutilization appears to be an ongoing issue.
sentences.chinese: 供體胰腺沒有充分利用的問題依然存在。
